aboutpara: I am an undergraduate double majoring in Computer science and Data Analytics at Denison University. I love to learn and build something new, innovative and creative. I‚Äôm looking forward to a career in ML Engineering and Data Science üßë‚Äçüíª

resume.description: I'm passionate in solving Machine Learning problems and building applications powered by LLMs and Computer Vision models.

experiences.position: Machine Learning Engineer @ Above Data, Inc.
experiences.bullets: Experienced in fine-tuning large language models including Flag Embedding and E5 models for a semantic similarity search system for ad searching. Successfully improved search relevance by 35% for retrieval tests, Developed and executed a PyTorch parallelization script to migrate and fine-tune large language models from local GPUs to Lambda's high-performance cloud GPUs. Achieved a 60% reduction in training time and a 20% increase in model accuracy enabling more extensive and prolonged training sessions.

experiences.position: Undergraduate Researcher @ Denison Computer Science Department
experiences.bullets: Developed visualizations for high-dimensional sensor data to analyze traffic patterns within university buildings, Researched and implemented dimensionality reduction techniques to transform complex sensor data into interpretable formats, The visualizations were utilized by university animation teams and featured in student research initiatives presented to an audience of over 2000 attendees.

Led a team of six data scientists to analyze internal surveys and conduct industry research for competitor comparison and strategic planning of tasks and action items, Analyzed 1000+ survey responses using feature engineering and cross-tab analysis with Excel to identify frictions in customer experience and marketing strategies for improvements with estimated increase in 10-20% retention rate, Collected and analyzed qualitative data through personal interviews and anecdotes with industry experts to improve strategic decision-making processes and gain nuanced insights into market dynamics. Resulted in 20% improvement in market positioning leading to increased visibility and relevance in the entertainment sector.

education.universityPara: ‚≠êHonors: Dean‚Äôs List, CS Department Awards, Sigma Xi (Research Honor Society), Upsilon Pi Epsilon (National Honor Society) ‚≠êRelevant coursework: Linear Algebra, Artificial Intelligence, NLP and Computer Vision, Statistics, Time Series Analysis ‚≠êCertificate: Analyze Datasets and Train ML Models using AutoML from AWS and Deeplearning.AI  ‚≠êLeadership & Involvement: Founder at Denison AI Hub, Founder at DeerX (University E-commerce App), Teaching Assistant for University Machine Learning Course, Student Representative at Denison Technology Council, Fencer for Denison Team
